ask.initial_room:
Vui lòng chọn phòng khởi tạo `( Kênh tham gia sẽ tạo ra phòng tạm )`. 
**Hướng dẫn : Nhập ** `<!tên_phòng>` hoặc `<#id_phòng>` hoặc `id_phòng`
ask.limit: Vui lòng nhập vào số người tối đa của room tự động tạo

private.label: Riêng tư
private.description: Phòng riêng tư chỉ người được cho phép mới có thể vào

public.label: Công khai
public.description: Phòng công khai ai cũng có thể vào

answer.initial_room: Phòng khởi tạo được chọn là : <#{{-id}}>
answer.limit: Số lượng thành viên tối đa của phòng tự động là : {{-limit}}

error.initial_room: Phòng vừa chọn không hợp lệ vui lòng chọn phòng trò chuyện
error.timeout: Hết thời gian cài đặt vui lòng làm lại từ đầu

command_disable.name: Command Disable command
command_disable.description: Disable a command in the server
command_disable.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while disabling the command

command_enable.name: Command Enable command
command_enable.description: Enable a disabled command in the server
command_enable.no_enabled: No commands are currently enabled (all are disabled)
command_enable.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while enabling the command

config_confession.name: Config Confession command
config_confession.description: Configure confession settings for the server
config_confession.confession_channel_option: The channel where confessions will be posted
config_confession.screening_channel_option: The channel where screened confessions are held for approval
config_confession.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while updating confession settings

auto_settings.name: Auto Settings
auto_settings.description: Configure server settings using natural language
auto_settings.request_option: Describe what you want to configure
auto_settings.example: ```{{-prefix}}as Create 5 color roles named Color01 to Color05```
auto_settings.not_config_request: {{-icon}} I can only help with server configuration. Please ask about creating roles, channels, or setting permissions.
auto_settings.no_action: {{-icon}} No action was taken based on your request. Please be more specific about what you want to configure.
auto_settings.no_action_detailed: {{-icon}} No action was taken. Your request may not be supported. Please see the embed below for what I can help you with.
auto_settings.error: {{-icon}} An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.
auto_settings.supported_operations:
**{{-info}} What I can help you with:**

**{{-roles}} Role Management:**
• Create roles with custom colors
• Update role colors, names, and positions
• Delete roles by name or pattern

**{{-channels}} Channel Management:**
• Create text, voice, and category channels
• Delete channels by name or pattern

**{{-info}} Server Information:**
• Query role and channel counts
auto_settings.query_all: Your server has {{-roleCount}} role{{#eq roleCount 1}}{{else}}s{{/eq}} and {{-channelCount}} channel{{#eq channelCount 1}}{{else}}s{{/eq}}.

giveaway.name: Giveaway command
giveaway.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while creating the giveaway
